description: RAG evaluation dataset — 10 questions with verifiable ground truth from project data

items.question: What is the total annual UK marketing budget?
items.ground_truth: The total annual UK marketing budget is £20,000,000 (£20M).

items.question: Which marketing channel has the largest budget and how much is it?
items.ground_truth: TV has the largest budget at £6,000,000 (£6M), which is 30% of the total.

items.question: What vehicle models are available and what are their starting prices?
items.ground_truth: DEEPAL S07 from £27,990; DEEPAL S05 from £24,990; AVATR 12 from £54,990; AVATR 11 from £59,990.

items.question: What is the total value of the ITV airtime purchase agreement?
items.ground_truth: The ITV airtime agreement is worth £3,300,000 (£3.3M), covering July to December 2025.

items.question: How many dealers are in the UK network and how many are launch dealers?
items.ground_truth: There are 50 dealers total in the UK network, with approximately 15 launch dealers.

items.question: When is the DEEPAL S07 UK launch date?
items.ground_truth: The DEEPAL S07 UK launch date is September 1, 2025.

items.question: How many marketing channels are there and what are they?
items.ground_truth: There are 11 channels: 6 digital (YouTube, Meta, Google, DV360, TikTok, LinkedIn), 4 traditional (TV, OOH, print, radio), and events.

items.question: What is the total value of the JCDecaux OOH advertising contract?
items.ground_truth: The JCDecaux OOH contract is worth £1,800,000 (£1.8M).

items.question: What is the annual budget for the radio channel?
items.ground_truth: The radio channel has an annual budget of £400,000 (£400K), which is 2% of the total.

items.question: How many weeks of data are in the MMM weekly channel spend dataset?
items.ground_truth: The MMM weekly channel spend dataset contains 52 weeks of data.
